thought: To craft cyan stained glass, I need to first craft cyan dye, which requires a green dye and a blue dye. I have a blue dye, but not a green dye. I can craft a green dye by smelting a cactus, which is in slot 41. I will move the cactus to slot 12 and smelt it to make the green dye.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 41 to slot 12 with quantity 1
